# konnect-beta_mesh_hostname_generator (Data Source)

MeshHostnameGenerator DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "konnect-beta_mesh_hostname_generator" "my_meshhostnamegenerator" {
  cp_id = "bf138ba2-c9b1-4229-b268-04d9d8a6410b"
  name  = "...my_name..."
}
```
